text: Gay marriage does not physically harm other people. [SEP] Homosexual couples not should have the same right to marry as heterosexuals. It's against God's will.

In fact, not only would gay marriage not benefit society, but gay marriage would actually hinder society because it would degrade the image of what marriage is. [SEP] Marriage does not only stand for the eternal love of a man and a woman, it stands for the love of two people no matter which gender they have.
